info.title: Kapu$ta Project
info.description:
This is a back-end documentation for [Kapu$ta Project](https://cabbage-project.netlify.app/) performed by Adamants team.
You can find out more about Swagger at [http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io) or on [irc.freenode.net, #swagger](http://swagger.io/irc/).

post.description: This can only be done by not already registered user.

400.description: User with same email already exists.

example.message: User with same email already exists.

get.description: This can only be done by registered user.

404.description: User not found or email already verified

post.description: This can only be done by user with verified email.
Refresh user tokens in case of 401 Unauthorized server response

requestBody.description: Valid user refresh body object with refresh token

401.description: Refresh token expired and user needs to log in

requestBody.description: Valid user logout body object with refresh token

400.description: Error in access/refresh token in header/cookie

get.description: This can only be done by not already logged in user.

200.description: Successful request to get user info

patch.description: This can only be done by logged in user.

400.description: Some body validation errors / Updating of user balance not allowed

patch.summary: Update user avatar with avatar file in from-data
patch.description: This can only be done by logged in user.

parameters.name: avatar
parameters.description: Single image file with valid MIME-type

post.description: User can invite friend to this Application. Friend will receive invitation email with link.

friendEmail.description: Valid friend`s email with min 2 domains

400.description: Some body errors (no friendEmail or friendName).

patch.description: This can only be done by logged in user. First time client sends ONLY phone number. Than user receives code in SMS. Secondly, client sends same phone number and verification code as well.

requestBody.description: Valid phone number with/without verification code

code.description: Verification 4-digit code sent in SMS on user's phone number by Twilio message-service

202.description: Code sent to user's phone number

400.description: Some phone/code validation errors, Phone number already verified

get.summary: Get all user's transactions with/without parameters
get.description: Get all user's transactions with/without parameters of choosing (by type, category, start date and end date)

schema.description: Date parameter for definition start date for searching in all user's transactions
Date parameter for definition end date for searching in all user's transactions

example.message: JOI error message: some parameters validation errors

patch.summary: Update user's single transaction by Id
patch.description: Update user's single transaction by Id. Allow to edit category, comment, amount, date. NB! not allows to update transaction type.

example.message: JOI error message: some parameters validation errors

delete.summary: Delete user's single transaction by Id
delete.description: Delete user's single transaction by Id.

get.summary: Get user's transactions details with date parameters
get.description: Get user's transactions detailed information with counting of amount by categories with date parameters.

schema.description: Date parameter for definition start date for searching in all user's transactions
Date parameter for definition end date for searching in all user's transactions

400.description: Some parameters validation errors / Cannot update transaction's type

example.message: JOI error message: some parameters validation errors

get.summary: Get total amount of user's transactions by type and by year
get.description: Get total amount of user's transactions by type and by months of year in parameters

schema.description: Year for searching of user's transactions

get.description: Get array of devs - information about developers

password.description: Valid password length: 8-12, must contain  lowerCase: 1,  upperCase: 1, numeric: 1, symbol: 1,

isBalanceSetted.description: This field shows that user set up his balance

balance.description: User balance !!! Allow to be set up ONLY one time after registration !!!

total.description: Total sum of all showed transactions (adding income, subtracting expense)

TransactionsSummaryResponse.description: Summary by type and year for user's transactions
